metadata.description: The War of the Programs is over and now Director Malcolm Colcord is ready to take his plans to the next level! It's the Weapon X you love; only now, all bets are off. Witness the beginning of the end of Frank Tieri's Weapon X saga! Starring Agent Zero, Fantomex, Sublime, Chamber, and of course, Wolverine!
metadata.name: Weapon X: Days Of Future Now
